modifier.etstlib.anti_stun_glasses.descr: Cancel hurt shaking and field of view effect.
modifier.etstlib.energy_shield.descripti: Blocks damage using FE,drains 10kFE per damage.If energy storage from one armor is not sufficient,then consume 2x energy from all the armor containing this modifier to cancel damage.
modifier.etstlib.energy_loaded.descripti: Your tool consumes energy instead of durability when is powered.
modifier.etstlib.applied_fixing.descript: Self-repairs when placed inside AE2 charger.
modifier.etstlib.atomic_decompose.descri: Fix your mining speed to your tool's mining speed.Ignores harvest tier.
